pull.title: build: Bump version to 0.16.2
pull.body: Missed for rc1. Might make sense to just jump to a quick rc2.

events.body: @laanwj , when you merge this locally, please reset your `0.16` branch to `20461fc`, then create a merge of (`20461fc` and `4244dbd`). This way the Tree-SHA512 will get added properly for all "leftmost" branch commits and merge commits without having to force push to the `0.16` branch.

> @laanwj , when you merge this locally, please reset your

Done. Thank you. I'm sorry for messing this up so badly.
@laanwj No worries, that's what rc's are for :)
